description: Have you ever wondered if angels really exist? On this mobile App, explore the archetypes and symbols that provide divine guidance to humanity. The deck is made up of 48 cards, each with a vibrant floral photograph. Author Meredith Young-Sowers provides inspiring messages on six aspects to spiritual energy, including reflection, partnership, integration, alignment, rejuvenation, and nourishment. An intuitive cover flow design makes navigating the App easy and fun. In Meditation Mode, create customized meditations and watch your favorite cards play in a slideshow. Listen to optional soothing music in the background, save cards to your Favorites, and share uplifting messages with friends via email or Facebook anytime.
